description: man in LRQ standing on a table with divided slots, pouring out letters from a mailbag; other men in background at table sort letters; men at left sort letters into vertical cubbyholes on wall; uniformed man in LLQ reaching into a large mailbag
marks: Signature LRC, in the print: [A LEPÈRE]
title: La Poste à Travers les Ages. Un Bureau de Poste à Paris.
